review: This is the second one I bought as a gift. Easy to use. Sometimes it likes to randomly disconnect.. and doesn't have HBO Now. Other than that I love it.

review: Great! Love it much more than my Apple Tv

review: No complaints here.  Amazing product at a great price.

review: Works great.  Only complaint - you need to side load any apps not included.

review: Love love love!  Wish i had gotten this sooner. Much better than the chrome one. Connected to the internet, unlike chrome where have to use your computer
